resources.string: Welcome to UserGuide App!
UserGuide
Basic Operation
Lock screen
Starter
Notification
Application
Converse
Details
Unread
Read
Description
Touch screen and slide by your fingers easily.
Pop-up menus or other operatings will be shown when you long press it.
Now touch the application on the screen to open your android journey.
Read
When screen is locked,you can touch the middle image and move to unlock icon.
Moving it to camera icon,you can open camera application directly.
Moving it to phone icon,you can open dialer application directly.
Moving it to message icon,you can open messsage application directly.
Otherwise, you may choose other lockscreen style in setting menu.
In main screen, you can long press your application and move to upside to delete it.
In widget screen, you can long press widget and add it into the main screen.
In main screen, you can long press to adjust widget size or move to delete it.
In main screen, you can touch widget to operate directly.
You can change wallpapers by long pressing the screen.
In main screen,you can move screen to left or right side.
Connect you phone to PC by USB line.
Dropping down status bar will show notifications.
Touch here to open or close functions directly.
Turn on or turn off screen auto-rotation in settings.
Change ringtones in profile settings.
Turn on or turn off notification sounds also.
Touch the menu key to find further operations.
Long press home key to find recent applications.
Touch application to open it.
Also touch widget to choose your widget.
Input your dialing number and touch the icon to call.
Hide dialing input keyboard by touching the icon .
Touch the icon in the middle to active operations.
Choose to answer or reject an incoming call.
Inputting dialer number will find matched numbers automatically.
Directly touch number to call in phonebook.
